price: Los creyentes son hermanos entre sí; reconcilien a sus hermanos y tengan temor de Dios para que Él les tenga misericordia.
arabic: إِنَّمَا ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنُونَ إِخۡوَةٞ فَأَصۡلِحُواْ بَيۡنَ أَخَوَيۡكُمۡۚ وَٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تُرۡحَمُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: innamā al-mu'minūna ikh'watun fa-aṣliḥū bayna akhawaykum wa-ittaqū al-laha laʿallakum tur'ḥamūna
